getStarted.termsConditions:
by Signing up you will agree to our
Terms & Conditions

otpScreen.title: Enter One Time Code
otpScreen.message: You will recieve a SMS with a 6 digits code.

connectAlert.title: Request sent!
connectAlert.subTitle:
You will be notified once %@ accepts the request.
Then whenver his/her data is changed you will be notified automatically.

createProfileForCardAlert.title: Sorry!
createProfileForCardAlert.subTitle:
You will need to provide us with all your details like phone, email, etc.
So we can provide you an e-card and share your details across the whole network.

errors.signWithPhoneError: A problem occured, please try again later
errors.emailError: Email required, must be a valid email

emptyTable.searchHistoryMessage: Please try making some search functions and if any results did match, it will appear here for faster access whenever needed again.
emptyTable.exchangeHistoryMessage: Please send data exchange requests to others or Tap your NFC card on others' devices to see the list of connected persons in here.
emptyTable.productHistoryLabel: You haven't activated any card. Yet!
emptyTable.productHistoryMessage: Order your e-card now, SWAP it anywhere you go and keep in touch all the time with your professional network.
